data.title: Pictures Of King Haakon VII, Queen Maud And Olav
data.meta_description: Here are some nice pictures of King Haakon VII (Prince Carl), Queen Maud and their son Prince Olav (later... King Olav) with his wife Marta...
data.text:
EliseLadyofLancaster

Gentry

Joined

Aug 2, 2003

Messages

80

Here are some nice pictures of King Haakon VII (Prince Carl), Queen Maud and their son Prince Olav (later... King Olav) with his wife Marta.

http://www.nb.no/html/haakon.html (A young King Haakon VII (b.1872-d.1957)

http://www.nb.no/assets/images/carlog_maud_stort.jpg (Prince Carl and Maud engagement picture)

http://www.nb.no/assets/images/Maud_stort.jpg (Pic of Queen Maud (b.1869-d.1938))

http://www.nb.no/html/Kongefam.html (A nice pic of Haakon, Maud and young Olav)

http://www.nb.no/html/haakon05.html (Naval officers saluting King Haakon VII)

http://www.nb.no/html/kronpolav.html

http://www.nb.no/assets/images/olavogmarta2_stort.jpg (This is a beautiful wedding pic of King Olav (b.1903-d.1991) with his wife Queen Marta(b.1901-d.1954)).

OP

OP

I realise that some of the links above are not work...therefore I corrected them as you read this message!

Here are the correct links:

http://www.nb.no/html/kongefam.html ( A beautiful pic of the Young Royal family with their young son Olav.)

http://www.nb.no/assets/images/maud_stort.jpg (An pic of an elderly Queen Maud.)

(...and the above link that includes "kongpolav" is a pic of a young prince Olav ....later King Olav!) :flower:

Originally posted by Elise@LadyofLancaster,Aug 5th, 2003 - 2:32 am[/URL

(This is a beautiful wedding pic of King Olav (b.1903-d.1991) with his wife Queen Marta(b.1901-d.1954)).

Hello Elise,LadyofLancaster,

Just to let you know that Crown Princess Martha died before King Olav became king on June 22, 1958 so that she never was Queen Martha.

OP

OP

BeatrixFan said:

Can anyone identify the lady in the red circle please? I can't find a name for her anywhere.

Pic from Corbis.Com

Crown Princess Märtha of Norway, nee Princess of Sweden and Norway. There's a biography written about her in the Norwegian forum. She is standing in front of her husband, then Crown Prince Olav of Norway.

She's also wearing the emerald tiara that Sonja is so fond of.
